title: The White-Label AI Website Builder
introduction: Kopage Website Studio is an easy-to-use, cloud-based website building platform that includes cloud web hosting. It allows users to create websites quickly with the help of AI, offering a range of features such as SEO tools, e-commerce, blogs, and more.
targetPeople: Individuals, agencies, and enterprises looking to build websites quickly and efficiently

faqs.question: What is Kopage?
faqs.answer: Kopage Website Studio is an easy-to-use, cloud-based website building platform (cloud web hosting included).

faqs.question: Is there a trial version available?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can get started for free, each new site comes with a 14-day free trial so you can try it out.

faqs.question: What is a White-Label plan?
faqs.answer: Once you sign up for a white label, Agency Plan, you can build websites for your clients, but each website will have your logo and colors. Your sites are hosted in a separate cloud instance from other sites.

faqs.question: What are the White-Label limitations?
faqs.answer: Kopage's Agency Plan comes with an included 5 website limit, but you can create as many websites as you'll ever need: each website over the included limit is only $5/month.

faqs.question: Can I host White-Label websites myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, sometimes your clients already have a hosting account and prefer to keep their website there: with Kopage's Agency Plan, you can not only keep websites in our cloud, but also self-host websites on the client's own server.

faqs.question: Can I use my own domains?
faqs.answer: Yes, with the white label plan, each new website will have a technical address in your domain, such as client.your-domain.com, but you can link any domain or even register new domains with us.
